employeeId.description: The unique personnel number (PERNR) assigned to the employee in SAP.

nationalId.description: The employee's unique national identification number (e.g., CPF in Brazil, Social Security Number (SSN) in the US).

admissionDate.description: The date on which the employee's contract begins. This typically corresponds to the "Hiring Date" in SAP.

position.description: The official  position code of the employee in HR Universe.

contractType.description: The type of employment contract (e.g., Permanent, Temporary, Contractor). This often maps to an "Employee Group" or "Subgroup" in SAP.

HRAdmission.description:
Represents new hire data for a collaborator, originating from the SAP HR Universe system.
This model is used to process the admission of a new employee.

employeeId.description: The unique personnel number (PERNR) assigned to the employee in SAP.

nationalId.description: The employee's unique national identification number (e.g., CPF in Brazil, Social Security Number (SSN) in the US).

admissionDate.description: The date on which the employee's contract begins. This typically corresponds to the "Hiring Date" in SAP.

businessUnit.description: The new  Business Unit code of the employee in HR Universe.

businessUnitName.description: The name of new Business Unit name of the employee in HR Universe.

position.description: The new position code of the employee in HR Universe.

positionName.description: The name of new position code of the employee in HR Universe.

department.description: The new department code of the employee in HR Universe.

departmentName.description: The name of new department code of the employee in HR Universe.

contractType.description: The type of employment contract (e.g., Permanent, Temporary, Contractor). This often maps to an "Employee Group" or "Subgroup" in SAP.

HRAdmissionRequest.description:
Represents new hire data for a collaborator, originating from the SAP HR Universe system.
This model is used to process the admission of a new employee.

employeeId.description: The unique personnel number (PERNR) of the employee.

nationalId.description: The employee's unique national identification number.

newPosition.description: The new position code of the employee in HR Universe.

changeDate.description: The date on which the contract change becomes effective.

HRContractChange.description: Represents data related to a change in an employee's contract, such as a promotion or lateral move, from the SAP HR Universe system.

employeeId.description: The unique personnel number (PERNR) of the employee.

nationalId.description: The employee's unique national identification number.

businessUnit.description: The new  Business Unit code of the employee in HR Universe.

businessUnitName.description: The name of new Business Unit name of the employee in HR Universe.

position.description: The new position code of the employee in HR Universe.

positionName.description: The name of new position code of the employee in HR Universe.

department.description: The new department code of the employee in HR Universe.

departmentName.description: The name of new department code of the employee in HR Universe.

changeDate.description: The date on which the contract change becomes effective.

HRContractChangeRequest.description: Represents data related to a change in an employee's contract, such as a promotion or lateral move, from the SAP HR Universe system.

employeeId.description: The unique personnel number (PERNR) assigned to the employee in SAP.

nationalId.description: The employee's unique national identification number (e.g., CPF in Brazil, Social Security Number (SSN) in the US).

HRInfoChange.description:
Represents new hire data for a collaborator, originating from the SAP HR Universe system.
This model is used to process the admission of a new employee.

employeeId.description: The unique personnel number (PERNR) of the employee being terminated.

nationalId.description: The employee's unique national identification number.

terminationDate.description: The final day of employment for the collaborator.

terminationReason.description: The reason code for the termination, which often corresponds to a "Reason for Action" code in SAP.

HRTermination.description:
Represents employee termination data from the SAP HR Universe system.
This model is used to process the offboarding of an employee.

employeeId.description: The unique personnel number (PERNR) of the employee being terminated.

nationalId.description: The employee's unique national identification number.

terminationDate.description: The final day of employment for the collaborator.

terminationReason.description: The reason code for the termination, which often corresponds to a "Reason for Action" code in SAP.

details.description: The reason code for the termination, which often corresponds to a "Reason for Action" code in SAP.
details.example: Employee is below company expectations for the position held

HRTerminationRequest.description:
Represents employee termination data from the SAP HR Universe system.
This model is used to process the offboarding of an employee.

deducaoDependeteIRRF.description: Valor de Dependentes a Deduzir do IRRF

tpAviso.description: Tipo de redução de jornada (0 - Nenhum, 1 - 2 Horas Inicio, 2 - 2 Horas Fim, 3 - 7 Dias)
